name: AirFox HD
description:
Bring back your childhood memories!
Experience your dads childhood games!

****** USER REVIEWS **********
"Everyone who played this game on Atari will fully pleased by this game"
"This is one of the best nostalgia games ever"
"Simple game but fun to play"

****************
A good game is not always a fancy game filled with 3d monsters and high-tech aliens. We believe simple ones are the best. The ones that entertained us in the old days and the simplicity was relaxing and fun ! They simply make our childhood dreams. The classic oldies that really never get old.
In AirFox, we travel to the 80's and the cartridge games age. We bring you back to that childhood dream of playing an airforce pilot, sent to big missions to defend their country.
